abstract: Toni H Wilson of Evansville, Ind, pleads guilty to felony charges of neglect and criminal recklessness after police find video of her toddler putting a handgun in her mouth; is sentenced to 30 months probation.
lead_paragraph: An Evansville woman whose toddler was shown on videos putting a handgun in her mouth has been sentenced to 30 months of probation.

headline.main: Indiana: Mother of Girl Seen With Gun Gets Probation
headline.print_headline: Indiana: Mother of Girl Seen With Gun Gets Probation

snippet: An Evansville woman whose toddler was shown on videos putting a handgun in her mouth has been sentenced to 30 months of probation.
